comment.body: Is it just me or is the 'pin / delete' bar missing when selecting file(s) in the ZeroHello file tab?

> [htgozn](#comment_4_1J58Rie679DVSuKB1iDyFFTbzmaMaY2bt2): Mine seem to be missing as well.

Bit of a problem if you want to delete files...

> [nofish](#comment_249_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj): Thanks for reporting, fixed!

Thanks for fixing, works again as designed :-)
